description: Listing products filtered by single category and sale price lesser/greater than or eq to

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: List of categories to be filtered by as comma separated values

parameters.name: sale_price_lte
parameters.description: Sale Price lesser than or equal to

parameters.name: sale_price_gte
parameters.description: Sale Price greater than or equal to

requests.response_body:
[
  {
    "id": 295,
    "name": "Output Bracket",

    "price": "19.66 USD",
    "sale_price": "9.99 USD",
    "under_sale": false,
    "sold_out": true,
    "created_at": "less than a minute",
    "updated_at": "less than a minute"
  }
]
